ratesheetUrl.title: Ratesheet URL
ratesheetUrl.description: Optional URL of the CMA/CGM ratesheet .xlsx file.

mode.title: Processing Mode
mode.description: AUTO attempts to detect 3117 vs feeder via Cover sheet; otherwise force a specific path.

delayBeforeMs.title: Delay Before Start (ms)
delayBeforeMs.description: Optional delay before processing begins, in milliseconds.

pushResults.title: Push Results To Dataset
pushResults.description: If enabled, attempts to push FinalRatesToEndpoint.json to the default dataset.
